Title: Directs the comptroller to examine and audit appropriations and contracts for short-term humanitarian aid, including shelter services, to migrant individuals and families
Summary: Provides that the comptroller shall examine and audit all contracts and funds appropriated for humanitarian aid, including short term shelter services, for migrants entering short term shelters on or after April 1, 2022 in New York city.
LawCode: Amd ยง8, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to directing the comptroller to examine and audit appropriations and contracts for short-term humanitarian aid including shelter services to migrant individuals and families
